Author: jl777c#5810
Content: dwy told me he was threatened. i asked him if it was from anybody on the team. he said it wasnt

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: anyway, in spite of my funding dwy with 3BTC, he was very upset that he didnt get the full bonus from the first month of hunting. it was a matter of 800 KMD or so, but it didnt seem right that he would get a full bonus after selling his nodes halfway through the first month of notarizing. so as a matter of principle i decided. there are no rules for what to do with the brand new hunting pool proceeds when a NN sells their nodes halfway through the month. I didnt feel we needed a general election to decide this issue. I decided half the time should get half the reward

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: 75% of blocks should get 75% of rewards

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: half the time should get half

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content:
I suppose people are entitled to their opinions, no matter how strong they may be. Myself, I dont mind that, unless it is forced onto others, or adversely affects others. 

With that being said, I find it a bit ironic that somebody publically criticizes a project for allegedly running some sort of organised slander complain on another, in turn, doing exactly what they are complaining about?
I agree with grewal, if there are problems, bring them to light in a constructive manner, present potential solutions and be open to discussion.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content:
For my part i can say this was one of the most extense discussions we ever had in the kmd nn community. Even got very emotional. Me being one of those.

Even though, when i understood that was the best solution for all, i just closed the case and moved on. 

It was a week  or 2 after the hack, we were all stressed, paranoid and exhausted. Anything would have been questioned or taken out of context easily. @jl777c maintained coherence, though even him had obvious signs of exhaustion and stress. I respect that.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Based on the facts that are present our hands are tied. We had to point out what we know and clarify our relationship as a pure technology provider.
